title: a new direction
html:
Starting today, I'm going to commit to posting here twice daily! More hacks, more commentary, more snark, and more grousing! I'll also be starting on that ten volume novel series finally! It'll be a multi-generational romance story set just after the Singularity!

...

Yeah, sorry, that's my crappy April Fools joke. I should probably go outside for the day and come back to the internets tomorrow. :)

Archived Comments

  • DX7119

    2007-04-01T20:55:54

    The folks the other side of the Singularity are waiting for Volumes 11-20...

    [Via the real wayback machine]
body:
Starting today, I'm going to commit to posting here twice daily! More hacks, more commentary, more snark, and more grousing! I'll also be starting on that ten volume novel series finally! It'll be a multi-generational romance story set just after the Singularity! ... Yeah, sorry, that's my crappy April Fools joke. I should probably go outside for the day and come back to the internets tomorrow. :)
